original_solution_mapping.L1: The mailman has 48 pieces of junk mail / 8 houses = <<48/8=6>>6 pieces per house.
original_solution_mapping.L2: The houses with white mailboxes get 2 * 6 pieces = <<2*6=12>>12 pieces of junk mail.
original_solution_mapping.L3: The houses with red mailboxes get 3 * 6 pieces = <<3*6=18>>18 pieces of junk mail.
original_solution_mapping.L4: The houses with red and white mailboxes will get a total of 12 + 18 = <<12+18=30>>30 pieces of junk mail.

original_function_code:
def solve():
    """Index: 5449.
    Returns: the number of pieces of junk mail each of the red and white mailbox houses will get.
    """
    # L1
    total_junk_mail = 48 # 48 pieces of junk mail
    total_houses = 8 # 8 houses on the block
    pieces_per_house = total_junk_mail / total_houses

    # L2
    num_white_mailboxes = 2 # 2 of the houses have white mailboxes
    junk_mail_white_mailboxes = num_white_mailboxes * pieces_per_house

    # L3
    num_red_mailboxes = 3 # 3 have red mailboxes
    junk_mail_red_mailboxes = num_red_mailboxes * pieces_per_house

    # L4
    total_junk_mail_red_white = junk_mail_white_mailboxes + junk_mail_red_mailboxes

    # L5
    num_red_white_mailboxes = num_white_mailboxes + num_red_mailboxes # 2 of the houses have white mailboxes and 3 have red mailboxes
    pieces_per_red_white_house = total_junk_mail_red_white / num_red_white_mailboxes

    # FA
    answer = pieces_per_red_white_house
    return answer

logical_steps.solution_line_template: The mailman has {total_junk_mail} pieces of junk mail / {total_houses} houses = <<{total_junk_mail}/{total_houses}={pieces_per_house}>>{pieces_per_house} pieces per house.

The houses with white mailboxes get {num_white_mailboxes} * {pieces_per_house} pieces = <<{num_white_mailboxes}*{pieces_per_house}={junk_mail_white_mailboxes}>>{junk_mail_white_mailboxes} pieces of junk mail.
The houses with red mailboxes get {num_red_mailboxes} * {pieces_per_house} pieces = <<{num_red_mailboxes}*{pieces_per_house}={junk_mail_red_mailboxes}>>{junk_mail_red_mailboxes} pieces of junk mail.

The houses with red and white mailboxes will get a total of {junk_mail_white_mailboxes} + {junk_mail_red_mailboxes} = <<{junk_mail_white_mailboxes}+{junk_mail_red_mailboxes}={total_junk_mail_red_white}>>{total_junk_mail_red_white} pieces of junk mail.
